website_summaries.verdict: A large table filled with many accessories like power and data grommets to facilitate productive meetings and keep people plugged in.
pros: Mahogany and walnut finish is extremely durable for normal, everyday use around the office
Includes a variety of power and data ports such as USB outlets and ethernet ports to keep computers and devices connected during meetings
cons: Has a gap between two of the surfaces

customer_reviews.title: I recommend investing in a glass top to prevent scratches
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality conference room table at an affordable price. I recommend investing in a glass top to prevent scratches. I ordered this table for my law office conference room after water damaged my previous table. I couldn't be more pleased with the quality and look of this table. I shopped for other tables, but they were just too expensive. This table looks looks like I paid five times the price. It is that pretty. I have received many compliments on it, even though I have had it only two weeks! It is also easy enough to assemble. My daughter put it together for me. Don't hesitate to purchase it. You will be happy you did!
customer_reviews.author: Specialk

customer_reviews.title: PRESTIGIOUS Conference Table a Hit!
customer_reviews.text: This executive conference table far exceeded my expectations. It is high quality and very classy in appearance. I would highly recommend this table! It was well packaged to prevent any damage and arrived on time. Assembly was easy, with all parts being present. The only challenge was that some of the screw covers to give it a more professional look did not fit. They just fall out.
customer_reviews.author: DiDi

customer_reviews.title: Love this conference table!
customer_reviews.text: We moved into a new office recently and have a conference room for the first time in a long time. I wanted something that was not super expensive but looked good. Believe me I looked around for awhile. When i found this one, the price was so amazing i was skeptical that it would be really nice. I was wrong...it is beautiful. It looks much more expensive than it was. I would definitely recommend this table.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Jo B

customer_reviews.title: Incredible Value
customer_reviews.text: This table is well worth the mone - looks and feels like a $2500 table. Product came well packaged - had a small issue with the center power hub plastic bezel breaking during shipment but Amazon gave a $100 credit which allowed me to buy a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon895

customer_reviews.title: Good table, however the table is long enough for ...
customer_reviews.text: Good table, however the table is long enough for 3 chairs on each side but you would only be able to push the middle chair under the table. The two support legs underneath the table come out too far. You could push 2 chairs under the table completely, but then you have a lot of wasted space. Little irritating...
customer_reviews.author: B&W Fiberglass

customer_reviews.title: Came broken
customer_reviews.text: It came with the electrical lid broken. The table is ok for the price. But it is sad that we have to have the electrical box open. Both of the tiny plastic holders for the lid were broken when we opened the box. The electrical box has a separate package and ours was not damaged. So the lid must have been broken before packing.
customer_reviews.author: Crazy shopper

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble table.
customer_reviews.text: I was able to assemble it by myself in about 20 minutes. It took two people to flip it over. The table looks great and was a wonderful value for our conference room.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Missing key item
customer_reviews.text: Nice table, but data and power port did not come with the shipment so we have a table with a hole in the middle. Very difficult to figure out how to get assistance with this issue. We're past the date to return the item (we had to wait for a room to be renovated before putting this together) although we really don't want to return it. We just want the piece that's missing.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Strelsin

customer_reviews.title: “Rich”quality desk for any business
customer_reviews.text: Good quality easy to assemble conference table priced well exactly what we needed You will be surprised with the quality and the look for the money Also have charging station
customer_reviews.author: Mirsad C.

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Conference Table
customer_reviews.text: This is an impressive table, solid wood, very heavy, and took two professional assembly guys about 1/2 hour to assemble. They were proud of getting it done without a scratch. This is not a DIY assembly it really takes two people to unload and assemble. Do not put water on the table (use coasters) because it will stain, but stains rub out relatively easily.
customer_reviews.author: luna

customer_reviews.title: Handsome sturdy table. A great value
customer_reviews.text: Handsome sturdy table. A great value. It took a while to assemble and, because it is solid wood, took 3 of us to turn it upright after assembly, but it was certainly worth it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Chris Sackellares

customer_reviews.title: so far so good, heavy
customer_reviews.text: so far so good, heavy, but easy to install. good quality for the money and looks really great in my board room!
customer_reviews.author: Bob love

customer_reviews.title: Nice conference room table.
customer_reviews.text: This table is built very well and went together easily. The finish is very nice and the table looks like a high end piece of furniture. It took 3 people to lift the top on the table and line up the dowels. Great product at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Ken D

customer_reviews.title: I just spent thousands building my new office. I ...
customer_reviews.text: I just spent thousands building my new office. I thought I was going to have to spend thousands more on this conference table and I obviously did not. It fit 8 modern executive chairs perfectly and I get compliments on it all the time. I would encourage this company to put more photos of the table on Amazon the one picture does not do it justice.
customer_reviews.author: george t.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. I did it alo e. The surface is very prone to scratching though.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki S.

customer_reviews.title: Great conference table
customer_reviews.text: Excellent table. Great buy. Thank you for previous reviews, they helped us to make decision and we didn't make mistake.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Table Arrived Damaged
customer_reviews.text: The table arrived with severe damage to the edges of both pieces of the table top. The grommet box was also cracked. I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Central FL Bushman

customer_reviews.title: Solid, relatively easy to put together and looks fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this conference table. Really sturdy and looks fantastic in our new office. Not many parts to assemble. It has a power and data ports concealed in a black center console which I didn't notice in the picture or description. We won't be running power or data to it, but it is a nice option if you are looking for that.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Stone

customer_reviews.title: It takes more than one person to put it together but it was quite easy to do so
customer_reviews.text: This table fully met my expectations. It is heavy conference table with a rich deep finish. It takes more than one person to put it together but it was quite easy to do so. The price was great also.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice table
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice table especially for the price. It looks very nice in our conference room. I would definatly buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Robert B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great table for the cost. It's solid and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: runningreadingman

customer_reviews.title: Great tables
customer_reviews.text: Awesome table for our new conference room, easy to assemble. Everyone loves it. Go me! Fits 10 seats with room to spare.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy S

customer_reviews.title: Love the table
customer_reviews.text: Amazon not very good at coordinating shipping big items but a great value
customer_reviews.author: Normal Guy

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and sturdy table. The Photos do not do it justice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Top very soft
customer_reviews.text: Top is very soft imprints when you right on paper through it.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Kayton

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful table
customer_reviews.text: Nice table. I have no idea how easy it was to put together, but it took my employees about hour - hour half. Heavy sucker. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: KLC

customer_reviews.title: This is a beautiful table. Color and components are just as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful table. Color and components are just as advertised. Delivery was just as scheduled. Everyone loves the table!
customer_reviews.author: Carol A.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and great delivery
customer_reviews.text: This conference table is a tremendous value! Looks and feels high quality and professional but is so inexpensive. Easy to set up and great delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Whippen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks Great. Very good quality. Arrived without damage in good packaging on wooden skid.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Tow

customer_reviews.title: Broken on Arrival
customer_reviews.text: Table top was busted on arrival. I believe it was dropped in the warehouse. I want to exchange it but the only option i have is to return.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality control
customer_reviews.text: Table was damaged in factory and shipped to me that way. Poor quality control. Company would not fix the problem. The top has multiple defects on the table top.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Ordering

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great looking table for the price. Fits in our conference room well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great looking table in our conference room
customer_reviews.text: have no complaints. Great looking table in our conference room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Table
customer_reviews.text: Great table for the price. If you could get this without the center cut out I would be at 5 stars. Easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: The quality of the table is good and has a nice finish
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the table is good and has a nice finish. However none of my holes line up on one half of the top board. Had to manually use a drill bit in order to drill new holes and break off one of the preset screws. It was completely unaligned. I guess I got the defected one out of the bunch. Still no excuse though for bad quality control. What should’ve been a 30 minute setup time turned into a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: JoeBama

customer_reviews.title: A good builder could do this easily
customer_reviews.text: 5 star for looks and class. 2.5 stars for ease of directions. A good builder could do this easily. It took 3 adult non builders 1.5 hours to assemble. The final product looks really nice. This sits in my law office conference room.
customer_reviews.author: T. Bogan

customer_reviews.title: Poor customer service
customer_reviews.text: I order a lot of merchandise from amazon and decided to order this for my office. There was a small mistake with shipping details and I tried to correct once it arrived at shipping company. It should have been simple and actually cheaper and closer for delivery but apparently the company refused to make an adjustment after several attempts. I refused the shipment with the delivery company and still have received no credit months later. On my latest attempt I was told once they process this I will also be charged 200.00 for a restock fee. This could have been so simple to resolve.
customer_reviews.author: J.h

product_meta.title: Regency Prestige 120-Inch by 48-Inch Conference Table with Power Data Grommet, Mahogany
product_meta.description: Color:Mahogany| Size:120-inchOutfit your executive or home suite with a tradition that lasts. Regency's Prestige Collection combines the quintessential elements of traditional elegance with classic lines, solid wood trim, beveled edge details and rich hand-rubbed veneer finishes. Meet in luxury with Prestige conference tables. Tasteful, two-tone inlaid edge detailing and alternating wood grains set these tables apart. A Power and Data Port makes tabletop connectivity easy. The Power/Data port includes (2) USB 2.0 ports, (2) USB charging ports, (2) AC 125V 60Hz outlets, (1) front/rear ethernet port, (1) front/rear phone port and has a black cover plate for a neat, clean look.
feature_bullets: Tasteful two-tone inlaid edge detailing and alternating wood grains
Power and Data port makes tabletop connectivity easy. Constructed of thermal fused melamine laminate on MDF with solid wood accents.
Classic lines, beveled edge detailing and solid wood trim make the Prestige Collection a timeless addition to any suite

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars66 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
